modName: Character Creation Sheet and Other Minor Resources
summary: A sheet to use when planning an new character as well as some other helpful resources and checklists. Good for role playing.
descriptionHtml:
3 different documents here:
FYI, these are intended to be printed out; there is a .txt version as well as a regular version of each.

Skyrim Character Creation:
Lets you plan out how your character will look, what in game sides they will choose (i.e. civil war,) their biography, their personality, their family and homes, and write down any challenges you wish to incorporate in your play through (i.e. 100% completion or role playing.) It also contains a handy list of extra perks; you can mark which ones to plan on getting so you get the most out of your game. These include the perks from the Black Books and the Nightingale perks, etc.

Reference Guide:
Here I included things I always find myself looking up. It includes a list of quests that have leveled rewards (plus the best level to get them,) conflicting quests that you should do before other quests, and a list of quests with skill bonus rewards.

Items to Collect:
This one has a bunch of odds and ends on it. It's got a list of "non-quest" items to collect (i.e. fire salts for Balimund.) It's got a list of the achievements both vanilla and DLC. There's a Thieves Guild radiant quest counter. There's an "Achieve That" guide for just the leveled achievements (I obviously did not make the mod Achieve That.) Finally, it has a to do list. I always find myself starting a non-quest journal task (like finding a birthstone) and get sidetracked, so it's nice to have a place to jot it down.
author: lavandaashley
